select a.id as userId, ifnull(b.rechargeTatal, 0) as amount, ifnull(c.commissionTotal, 0) as commissionAmount from sys_user a left join (select sum(amount) as rechargeTatal, create_by from recharge_detail group by create_by) b on a.id = b.create_by left join (select sum(amount) as commissionTotal, create_by from acting_commission_detail group by create_by) c on a.id = c.create_by where 1 = 1
and d.phone = #{request.keyWord} or d.id = #{request.keyWord} or d.account = #{request.keyWord}
order by amount
order by amount desc
order by commissionAmount
order by commissionAmount desc

select c.id as userId, b.level as actingLevel, c.create_date as createDate, d.sumTotal as amount, e.commissionAmount as commissionAmount from acting_hierarchy_relation a left join acting b on a.acting_id = b.id left join (select (sum(amount)) as commissionAmount, create_by from acting_commission_detail group by create_by) e on e.create_by = a.create_by left join (select (sum(amount)) as sumTotal, create_by from grab_red_packets group by create_by) d on a.create_by = d.create_by left join sys_user c on a.create_by = c.id where a.superior_id = #{id} order by c.create_date desc
